html.p:
Client filtering can be performed using fields from sourcetype:(software|hardware)_inventory or sourcetype:bigfix:asset:list.
For example:
nt_host=sys*
nt_host=* operating_system=Win*
nt_host=*

search.query: `bigfix_index` (sourcetype=bigfix:asset:list OR sourcetype=bigfix:clients) | search $filter$ | dedup nt_host | table nt_host, ip, dns, user, operating_system, last_report_time
`bigfix_index` (sourcetype=bigfix:asset:list OR sourcetype=bigfix:clients) | `time_conversion(last_report_time)` | search $filter$ | timechart dc(last_report_time) by nt_host

`bigfix_index` sourcetype=bigfix:analysis | dedup nt_host, property_name, property_value | join nt_host [search `bigfix_index` (sourcetype=bigfix:asset:list OR sourcetype=bigfix:clients)] | search $filter$ | stats values(property_value) as property_value by nt_host property_name | sort nt_host, property_name

`bigfix_index` sourcetype=software_inventory NOT "--||" | dedup nt_host, property_name, property_value | join host, client_id, [search `bigfix_index` (sourcetype=bigfix:asset:list OR sourcetype=bigfix:clients)] | search $filter$ | stats values(property_value) as property_value by nt_host property_name | sort nt_host, property_name
